message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. I believe it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000.  What are your thoughts?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I am willing to offer $1,200,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
